account.descriptionLink: Replace the previous proposal(instruction to reduce the amount was not saved)
account.name: Decrease amount of gSAIL to create a new governance n°2
Decrease voting days from 7 to 3 days and gSAIL required from 20k to 10k

account.descriptionLink: Currently, voting on each proposal submitted by DAO takes 7 days, and because many people who staked coins on the farm do not want to block their funds for a such long time , we want to shorten it. The amount for creating a new proposal allows only the richest investors to create suggestions for improvements to the project - reducing the amount will also allow people with a smaller budget to use DAO
account.name: Shortening the voting period from 7 days to 48h for new proposals and reducing the amount for its creation from 20k gSAIL to 10k gSAIL

account.descriptionLink:
Following all recent events on Solana and crypto in general, I have decided to ask to our community through a proposal if they want to stay on Solana or leave it and migrate to Ethereum.

Please vote yes if you want that SolanaSail stay on Solana 

Please vote no if you want that SolanaSail leave Solana and start the study to migrate SAIL/GSAIL and then launch the NFT collection on ETH (yeah we have some f?cking good new ideas) (then SolanaSail must be renamed)

Wishing everyone a healthy 2023.

Your Founder.
account.name: 2023 : The future of SolanaSail
